name: Rosa Platformer
description:
This is a very simple platformer, and you can beat it in a few minutes if you're any good, but some jumps can be a little tricky. And this game will not forgive you for failing, you'll have to do it all over. But it isn't that long ♪

Controls:

A left

D right

spacebar jump

R restart

♫♪♫♪♫♪

I want to practise making games, so that I can actually do something I want later. I started this on November 1st, and I'm going to try to make one game a week. I failed a lot more than I thought I would, but I managed to do something. I also wanted power ups and enemies in this one, but I was unable to do so for this time.

Everything in this game is something I designed myself.

Trying to do a new, different game next week. ♫
